content.detailedDescription:
The first encounter
 i came home from  friends house at approxiately 2330 on june 12 2013, got outof my car and looked upto seea giant ufo floating over my house. it was round had severallightsand madeno noise, it was so close i could throw a rock at it very easily, so i bent doown to get one and it began moving forward. i was puzzled onhow it knewthat i wasgoing to thhhrow the rock at it but it was clearly awareofwhat i was doing.I watched it slowly move off over the other houses i am thefirst houseat the begininng of the street theres another twenty after me and im on a round about with other houses. theneighbourcameout of her houseand spotted the ufoover my house and said theres a ufo and went back inside her house. well i was shocked i thoughtfor sure she would bemoreinterestedbut iwasn'tgonna passup this oppurtunitty to see the craft, i've been waiting my whole lifeto spot some ufo's, i hadsightings of high speedlightsin 2000 in canada, but those you could barelysee, thesewererioght upcloseyoucouldjust about jump and touch them.
two more ufoswereflying in the sky the next onepassed over my headjust as the firstone went out of sight. it was blue with a white glow behing with grey metalish plating of the  hull. this craft was a bitlonger than the first one and appeared to be more high speed or war ready. finally it went passed adn the third ufo came over head,thisone was muchmorefaster looking it, this was triangular and very aerodynamic, it also made no sound, it was strange the streetwass quiet with these ship overhead.I stayed outside till 530 am, when the sky first was lit by the firstfew strands of sunlight,this is when the craft headed off in a sw direction, i couldnt beilivetheycircled the area all night.
i was so amazed that happened to me, i headed to bed.

second night of ufo's
i arrivedhomeagain late about 2300,and thereagain the ufo's were circling the neighbourhood , they almost seemed to notice i was back and headed overmy houseagain doing loops of the hill were on.
this nightiws going to b more ggressive with the ufo's
i was going to try and communicate with them
itried shouting at each one but that didnt work and i didnt want to wake the neighboursforhalf thenighti triedcommunicationwith themouth,butnosucess,so i was going 'to see if they could read my mind,
and i said with my mind "hello", and the craft turned around and headed toward me and pause over the fieldto the east of my house, it was twenty feet away and stoppedmid air and just looked at me
nexti tried tosay other things but it didnt seem to respond,this went on for an ohur before i gave up
dissapointed i hung my head and the craftmoved off into the loop it was flying
i tried saying aomethingelse with my mind and the craft turned back toward me, and hovered there again.
i was in awe it would not communicate but it knew i was trying to talk. i tried mindedwords to thecraftall night tillmorining but all it would do isfly towardme and hover there, even if i walked off into further down the street. this craft had a yellow star shape light and a brown body an looke older than the other craft, there was four tonight.
over thenextfourmonths the craft came everynight and they would fly over my head and follow me wherever i went at night,they would know where i was nomatter wherei hid.
i began to beco0me awarethey taking off from the vicinty of an army base in the distance, where they keep the army fighter jets, i live next to one army base but about twenty kms away there is another one they appeard to take off from.At least in the direction of one and alsoland there when the sun came up.
the fifth craft and an real alien
one of thenights i was trying using abusivetype lingo with the craft,and i got a response no one could forget. i haeded down mtlindsay rd,and a fifthufo appearedoverhead quite low with a figure stading in a doorthat waslitqith  yellow backlight, and wasopen in the frontof the craft, this craft lookedmore armylike the figure had a black birdsheadand was about 5foottall, and wearing grey blueclothes it was hovering near me looking like rae in the stargatefilms and it jumped down into the trees near me, and teh streetlightstarted moving side to side veryviolently, i dont know how i couldnt see anything shaking it. i got scare a loud animal sound snarled in the bushes andi tookoff running down the side road as fast as i could, i turrned around and looked the figurewas climbing back into thevehicle and began to chase me down the street, all  did swas run soo much faster, i couldnt believe how fast i was going, more sounds were coming from the bushes on the side of the road big thikngs moving in the dark, thecraft took a low swipe over the road nearlyhitting me, and swung around over the hgihwayreadyingfor a second pass, i was nerly to the top of teh overpass and i saw i would be unprotected there, so i ran back down to the bus shelter and heswoope two more times but couldnt get close enough to hit me. holy crap this was serious i was being chasedy what looked like an alien, now this doesnt happen everyday. 
i had to get out of here he coudlland so easily,his craft was circling the highway and shopping center and taking loopa over my head, his craft,moved so smooth and fast but with no noise,, it glowed undererneath, it wasnt verylarge, maybe the sizeof four carsnot something ou would take into space i dont think.
i was panicking,i neeeded to get away, i ranwith all my mustertowards the bushesandrahn throughthem in the pitch black,there is a park near my housethatconne3cts the houses in the area, there were shrieks squabbles and snarlscoming from above me as i ran theough i didnt dare stop, the noises ewrte so alien nothingon earth i have heard before i was down right terrifying.
i headedout of the park, one of theufos heaaded up teh street i lived on,i ran and ran and rantill i got to the door and jumped inside my house, i looked bd barricaded the door behind me, iclosed all the window blinds.
then i haed another snarl
i looked right, you could seeaglow throughthe windowas it walkedpast, it began smashiong together objuects in the yard it conitnues to make that hideious snarling sound. 
then it came a challenge through telepathy to come outside and "meet" him
how terrrifying
i couldnt muster anything but no
he got terrifyinly angry and jumped on the roof, and made more terrible noisesyou could hera the strange animal feet it had walking across the roof, and then it jumped,
i nealry shat myselfwas it gone
i went outside, looked in the skyand didnt seehis flying craft, just the fiirst three ufo's. iwalke upthe street butnothing was there.
that was so terrifying.
the morning camehe didnt return, 
the next day i went around to the light that had been shakenand it was bent as if somecraft had landed on it and pushed down from the sky to bend the steel pipe holding the light alot.
i couldnt handle one of those every night
the next few nights were calm just the first three ufos
theufo's followed me aaround over the nwxt few months, i talked to one of the neighbours and he had seenthe ufo's too at night flying over near my house. 
i tried coaxing one of the ufos to land but all it did was almost land in the park and float above the ground playing coy with me, s i lsot interst in the ufo'sthey flew loops over thetownwe lived in taking off fromthe armybase and landing in the same areaalways doing loops of the area.
one night i worked up the nerve to challenge them to a battle, i would see if the rae like bieng would come back. i drove up to the mountains on the state border and they followed me 180 kms and stillldid loops over head. i got out of my car and began to make mental commentsto the ufo's, they seemed to get quiteangry and would pressureme to stop thinking about atom bombs and how to build them you could "feel" the ufo's were adjutated about the subject.
i got out of my car and counted there were 4  ufo's, then off in teh back ground you could see some stars moving there was at least five of them, they were flying in formation shimmering like stars, 5 stars moving across the sky, then they gotawhoopelot closerand began circling teh valley i was in the mountains still a pressurefeeling was coming fromteh craft,tghe temperature dropped right down it was so cold, i could see my breath adn started shaking,  i got so uncontrollably cold i jumped back into teh car, i tried starting it to turn on the heat and nothing happend. oh dearr i looked up intothe sky, i tried starting it again ,and agian nothign happened. then the car felt like it had been grabbed and was beingblown on by somethign, and intensew wind was blwing down thwe sidesof the windows, it was like wewerecaught by the craft. i couldnt see the craft as i was in a suv and the roof blocke the viewof slightly behind us, the car was shaking and moved slighty underthe pressure, the roof ached and almostfelt liek it wsa going to bow,
i stoppedand apologized for thinking about bombs, and it stopped. the wind the light the craft were all gone, all the craft circling had taken off too.It was just me in the mountains alone. the car started this time and i headed home, heading northon the mt. lindsay highway i spotted a different light in the sky,it wasa star, it was moving side to side over the highway almost like it was waving to me. i followed it, i stopped over park ridge rd and the mt lindsayhovering over the intersection were i had my most terrifyingencounteradn i droverunderneath it i headded home i was spooked from the mountain. the light was a star and wasflying over the neighourhood, but ti was a differnet type of flying it often stopped over houses and did alook st me rather than travelover headit was just in the area, it stayed for a couople of months but did nothing other than hover.
the udfos stayeduntil i leftin novembe3r of2013,they were interested in the town for somereason. 
i definatley had one unforgetable expierence
content.distance: 20 Feet or Less, 21-100 Feet, 101-500 Feet, 501 Feet - 1 Mile, Over 1 Mile
content.summary: 6 months of nightly ufos at night multiple witnesses close to army base real alien in craft

content.detailedDescription:
On july 12, 2015; dumfries, virginia between the hours of 0235 am to 0300 am, i decided to go back outside to check things out again. this time, i observed one more of the sightings creeping across the northwest ceiling of the sky between 0240 to 0255, and then about one to three minutes later i saw a totally different phenomenon appearing out of the medium of the sky as if escaping one dimension and dashing into another, seemingly at a rate 10 times the speed of light or thought.

this occurrence greatly amazed me, and i hurried to ask a neighbor who was sitting in his car two houses down to see if he had seen what just happened in the sky, above our neighbors homes across the street.
content.summary: A powerful force

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Unknown
content.detailedDescription: My small children and myself were walking around the park picking berries on a nice sunny warm day not many clouds in the sky, and we looked up and sighted a white round ufo stationary in the sky. it was around 5pm and i had my cannon camera with me and so i started to film it. my young toddler was crying in the stroller so i didn't film it for long because it was distracting me and i couldn't get the camera to be still in my hand but i still managed to get a great video of what we saw. a moment after turning off the camera i looked and it was gone. i told my 5 year old maybe it will come back and let us watch it after we pick some more berries and so we walked for a few minutes and looked and it was back again. it seemed to super slowly move a tiny bit if you were sitting still watching it. it was pretty amazing. it disappeared right in front of our eyes. not long after seeing it we saw a white airplane roughly the same area and height in the sky. comparing the size i would say the ufo was maybe half the size of the airplane. i wasn't afraid and i wanted to see it again but we continued to the playground area and i looked a few times and didn't see it again.
content.summary: Walked to clark creek park in salem with children and was talking and looked up and we saw and filmed ufo during the day

content.detailedDescription:
On july 11, 2015;dumfries, virginia between the hours of 10:10 pm to 10:55 pm, whether ufo or not, i don’t know, but i witnessed three individually strange stealthy sightings creeping extremely high across the ceiling of the sky (like a bug crawling on a ceiling) without lights or noise, as if trying to avoid being recognized. the images of the object seem to be a round jagged shape. 

during this sequence of events, i saw three to four airplanes flying across the sky about 20 minutes or so before 10:30 pm on july 11, 2015; the airplanes’ shapes were very easily identified with their tail lights flickering. however, the three sightings were quite unusual; the ufos absolutely did not appear to be an aircraft or a helicopter for sure, but a very small rounded jagged shape. indeed, the sighting was certainly scary and shocking to witness.
content.summary: My purpose for star gazing was to see if ufos truly existed.

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i had just arrived home and was parking on the driveway.We got out of the van and walked towards the house and noticed the bright orange glowing light in the sky.The light was caught from the corner of my eye so i asked my wife what she thought it could be.The light was heading towards the our house from out in the distance.As it got closer it sat stationary and pulsated for a minute or so and then shot across the sky away from the house and vanished.Then the other two objects came from the same area as the first and came to a complete stop and pulsated like the first but less time then the first and vanished.Whatever the objects were we were unclear and could not figure out what they were.We were freaking out and some what confused.My nephew and i had an experience back in feb 2015 from the house similair to this experience.
content.summary: My wife and myself had just parked on the driveway and was walking to the house when suddenly we both notice the first orange glowing light in the sky out in a distance. then the second appeared they vanished and then the third appeared and then vanished

content.detailedDescription:
I was standing upstairs (3rd story) in a condo in the brodie heights subdivision on davis ln. i looked out of the upstairs bedroom window which faces west and noticed a cube shaped formation floating about 50 feet above the roof tops at about 20 to 25 mph.

the formation consisted of 5 cube-like objects tilted on an axis with one cube on top, 3 cubes rotating or oscillating like an orbit, and one cube on the bottom. the top and bottom cubes did not appear to be spinning or orbiting as the progressed in a straight line northward through the sky. the color was brownish tan or copper.

this occurred at about 7:40pm cst, which means the sun had not fully set and there was still a good amount of daylight. i did not observe any lights or hear any sounds (though i was inside with the windows closed).

because the objects were moving so quickly i did not have time to run downstairs for my phone or a camera. i called a friend over to the window and he also witnessed the formation.
content.summary: Cube-like oscillating formation floating on tilted axis over rooftops.

content.detailedDescription: We went outside after a bad thunderstorm after it died down a bit, while we were viewing the sky we spotted a classic ufo like object. we then got someone else to come outside with us and see if they seen the same thing, without pointing it out, they seen the object too. after the three of us all agreed we seen something in the sky we took a picture of the object, after the picture was taken the object faded into the sky. we went back into the house and sat around for a few minutes before two of us went back out to look at the sky some more, we went around the back of the house and something told the two of us to look up, that's when we spotted a second object. one of us pointed it out to the other, and right before our eyes this second object faded out into the sky like nothing was there, but we could see an aura where it had been. we took a moment or two to recount what we had just witnessed and we were excited about what had taken place.
content.summary: There was a bad thunderstorm, and after every thing quitened down we went out and seen a ufo shaped object hovering overhead

content.detailedDescription: We were visiting relatives nearby. we both lived on the same lake. our two kids were playing outside and started yelling at us to come outside and see what they were seeing at the lake.  we ignored them at first and waited several minutes but they kept yelling at us so we went out on the deck and saw a round craft about 20 feet in diameter with colored lights around the disc hovering over the lake. one adult said they could see people inside of it. it was almost dark outside. the object hovered for a few minutes then shot off to the north in a blink of an eye. the whole event took 15 minutes at least.  the craft looked like it had a dome on it. they apparently let us watch them becuase they didn't leave immediately when we first saw the craft. we never saw it again.
content.summary: Kids saw it first. adults next.  hovered over water the shot off to the north.

content.detailedDescription: Ufo destroys america and microwave laser people help!
content.summary: Ufo fire 8,000 people, microwave laser gun and ufo burn down reno and california!

content.detailedDescription:
I don't know the date but would guess between 04-08, probably before 11p.M.
it caught my attention coming off the southern horizon headed basically north.  a regular plane at 75-100,000' between 4-600m.P.H. takes 6-8 minutes maybe.  this went fromhorizon to horizon in a matter of seconds.
i seen it 3 times, one time i was on the phone.  i looked for space shuttle flights and none fit the time frame.  i wrote n.A.S.A. but with no response.  i did hear brief mention of it on the radio, but that was it.  i questioned the sr-71, but it's been long retired.  where i'm not really wanting to report anything, i was wanting to find out if anyone else seen similiar here or has information on this craft?  it's said there's test planes that can go 4-5000 m.P.H. i read, i haven't seen.  being it was briefly mentioned, someone else got access to satellite imagery, radar or something.
content.summary: Looked like a plane @ about 75-100k', but trekked across in seconds; a plane takes 6-8 min.

content.detailedDescription:
Observed pattern of extremely bright 5 lights or objects.  pattern was in a spread out dipper shape but the objects came closer together before disappearing in the clouds. direction was to the nne and high not directly over.  four adults and 8 year old observed.  objects showed against solid cloud light gray backdrop.  ascended into the clouds.  stationary when first observed and ascended straight up. took picture with i phone but not a good photo.

we were visiting on our sons family on their backyard deck.  first impression were very bright  crisp lights in an unusual pattern that were not moving.
content.summary: Observed pattern of lights

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was in backyard thought  i was looking star but after looking at pic it wasn't a,star. went to front yard and it was gone.. i was rounded and with features on it.
content.summary: Pic taken like bottom of something

content.detailedDescription: I was looking at stars one night saw a drone thought no big deal,then more and more every day and night, landings takeoff,like these things are working.I need help to many to document.

content.summary: These objects are over laguna beach every night and day since june 20th come see for yourself

content.detailedDescription:
- my ex husband and i were stationed in quantico virginia, 

i just had put our children to take an afternoon nap- must of been 1;00 or 2;00 pm

i  had lay down in the couch in the living room to watch tv,
 and realized i was sleepy , so i turned off the tv and decided to take a nap as well

while iam sleeping , i hear a beeping sound near my ear, thinking that was my toddler that woke up and was playing one of her toys in my ear- i turn around expecting to find her there with her toy-

when i turn around i see this two small creatures standing beside the couch, staring at me,  pointing at me with some object that looked like some sort of remote control ( at least that's the closest description i can give)
the object had colored bottons that seem to flicker

when they pointed at me, i couldn't move, i couldn't see well either, was like if i had a veil in top of me,

i became extremely angry cause i coulnt move, and i feared for my children that were a few feet away in the other room sleeping

i couldn't talk or move, but in my mind i could talk to them and they to me,
i told them to release me , they in exchange said to each other, shes getting angry, we don't supposed to touch her

i got this feeling, as if they for some reason knew they didn't supposed to touch me, without my consent

they again pointed the object to me, the object made a noise and they were gone and i was released


when i became released , i coulnt move still, it was as if i was drugged and i only could move really slow, i crawled towards my children room, in total panic ...Once i was able to move enough to stand up

wich took me around 5-8 minutes...I checked my children and woke them up, to check their skins for any cuts bruises or marks in them

i found nothing...

but i was very afraid after that
content.summary: --aliens in uniform--quantico virginia--

content.detailedDescription:
On december. 26th 2014 at 9:00pm to 9:15pm while on the phone w /a friend in las vegas i observed a large green lumiated fan shaped object to north .It was flanked on 
both sides w/coulumns /tubes launching orbs in to the sky 
a few minutes it) jus disappered, then while i was describing it onthe phone it instantly reappeared 10 times brighter with the fan shape pulsating like a keyboard,w/ the columns,,launching super illuminating balls inthe sky that occured about 5minutes or less. the entire event took less than 15 minutes then nothing it was clear sky all eve 
i look looked the next evening same time a d saw nothing ever again
content.summary: I observed luminous green lights in a fan shape w / colunms on each side of green light shooting balls  4-5 on each side then 10- 12 .;;two incidents. back to back

content.detailedDescription:
--again--what seems a dream but is not--

i was living in manteo north carolina at the time-

i thought i was dreaming-

in the supposed dream, i was dreaming i was in what seems to be a dentist chair,

i was alone in the room-the room was very bright, as if the walls were made of light, the room was white in color

i was sitting in what seems a dentist chair-then this guys , human like, comes over and sits beside me in another chair like dentists do, when he gets near me,he has a long needle in his hands, and iam thinking ok, hes gonna fix my teeth

but all of the sudden i have the needle over one of my eyes, i go into panic mode and i start struggling with the supposed needle and the man that's trying to put the needle in my eye

somehow i was able to get out of the chair, trying to find the way out of the room was insane, cause the walls had no doors--

then a young man like me in those days appeared and told me the door is here, and before he was able to get me out, an alien appeared, he was very light green greyish- he was holding me in my upper arm-- i struggle till i got away

when i woke up---i had a hand marked in my upper arm, with 3 finger, the mark stayed there maybe half an hours after i woke up-

i believe i was abducted-
content.summary: --the dentist chair--not a dentist

content.detailedDescription: On november 10th 2012, i ended up going to sleep early. it was roughly 18:30hrs when i fell asleep on the couch in the living room. it felt like i just closed my eyes for a second when i woke up having a strange feeling that something wasn't right. i tried to move but it was difficult so i panicked. i went to feel if my dog, who was a puppy at the time, was there. it took a lot of work but i felt her with my toes. next, i tried to see if the cat was around. i saw it on the, i don't know what you call it, arm chair? anyways, i saw it there not moving. i still couldn't shake the feeling that something was wrong then i noticed it. i noticed that feeling that i wasn't alone and that there was something else in the house with me. i remember the feeling i got from it, it felt...Dark? empty? i don't know how to explain it but it definitely didn't feel normal. i couldn't figure out where it was so i layed back down thinking i was just imagining things. something happened that made me realize i wasn't imagining things. in the house i heard the faint creak of someone or something stepping on the floor board. i can't quite explain what happened next but from what i can recall, i tried to get up but froze. so, i turned my eyes in the direction of the kitchen and that's when i saw this strange figure,obscured by the darkness, just standing there before it started to walk over towards the couch. i don't remember much of what happened afterwards but i just remember i woke up at 05:30 scared and gasping for air. i tried to pass it off as just a bad dream and i was imagining things but i couldn't shake the fact that whatever, or whoever it was, the floorboards creaked under it and since the doors were locked when i woke up, it made me question it as a dream. still to this day, i don't know if it was a dream or an encounter or what but the sound of the creaking floorboards is stuck in my mind.
content.summary: Dark figure in house

content.detailedDescription: Esta imagen fue tomada en una excursion al desierto de la tatacoa en huila colombia la imagen la registro mi compañera desde mi celular samsung tomo varias fotos seguidas pero solo quedo registrada en una el hecho se presento cerca a  un sitio conocido como el aeropuerto ovni, solo nos percatamos del ovni después de ser tomada
content.summary: Platillo volador

content.detailedDescription:
-at first it seemed like if i was dreaming-

i saw a very bright blue light coming from my window -
 i got up thinking i had left my window opened-
-something i never do-

when i reached the window i realized it was closed, and then i said to myself, where is this light coming from, but then the light disappeared,

my dog started barking, and i decided to get up and go to the area of the garage to see what she was barking too- when i open the door of the kitchen that leads to the garage- i hear what it seems to be children laughing--

--but it was late for any child to be playing in the street, i look around and see no one--

--then i see this 3 beings, they were about the size of a child of 3-5 years of age- 

they had human form, but they were made of stars, had no features, just sparkling stars...I realized i was seeing some form of extraterresttial entity, and i asked them not to enter my home, cause if they did i was gona freak out...

--they didn't came in as far as i can remember, but they were going around the house as if they were running around it, and i could see them very clear--

when i came into what at first seem to be a dream- i was standing in the garage drive way outside--and my dog was inside the house hiding under my bed-

i don't believe was a dream...I never sleep walk...So i believe it was an apparition .
.
.
content.summary: - star like beings--entering my house--

content.detailedDescription:
I was in ocean park, waiting with some friends for a gathering to start,
we get together to do drumming for full moon,

me and one of my friends, separated ourselves a little bit from the group, so we could have a conversation,

we were standing maybe 20 feet from the edge of the water,

all of the sudden a helicopter appeared coming from the west north side of the horizon..Got very close to the shallow part of the water beaming a light towards the water

due that is a tourist area, and sometimes there are drownings, we thought, was a helipcopter looking for a body

me and my friend thought to ourselves, they most be looking for someone that drown

the helicopter came very close to were we were standing to the shallow part of the water, and i told my friend, 

oh i hope they haven't found a body right there, cause it kept hovering over the same area in the shallow part in front of us

at one point i thought the helicopter will try to land in the area  were we where and we kind of start walking backwards cause it seem like it was charging towards us-

then it lifted-and- pass above us--but when it passed above us, turned into an airplane-

-an airplane that sounded like an airplane- when a few seconds before we were witnessing a helicopter -

her and i stayed paralyzed, and asked each other if we saw the same thing-

we both did-

the strange thing is that we were talking about ufos, and was the first time her and i ever talked about the subject

and this happened
content.summary: Helicopter--that shapeshifted into an airplane

content.detailedDescription:
When i was 11 years old i was asleep in bed. it must have been nearly midnight. i woke up sat up in a cold metal chair like a arm chair. there were blinding white lights pointing at me from all directions so i couldn't see past them. i could hear whirs and hums from machinery. i could make out humanoid beings walking around behind the lights. they sounded like they were speaking in a clicking sound. they never came close enough to see them properly. they stayed behind the lights. i was scared being a child and being woken from a deep sleep. i tried to talk but no sound came out of my mouth. suddenly i felt very tired and couldn't keep my eyes open any longer. i woke up the next morning in bed with no memory of what had happened. it wasn't till last year (when i was 30) when i started to remember small details of some sort of experience. 
i feel like a fraud as i have never spoken about this to anyone. even my wife. i'm scared no one will believe me. i have no proof of this experience. just memories.
content.summary: Out of body feeling. woke up in cold metal chair. bright lights. strange beings walking around.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving west, south leaving the airport,

 i see this silver orb, seems to be hovering near our international airport, at first it seems to be hovering,

 i took several pics but was with my cell phone camera 
and didn't come out good-looked like a drop of water in the picture

it went from being an orb and shapeshifted into an airplane-

went from being a silver orb, and then turned into a black hole and then turn into a black airplane--

once turned into an airplane , it took off towards the south and disappeared-
content.summary: Small like silver orb..Near airport..

content.detailedDescription:
I was coming back from poetry night with a friend, we were driving east on hwy. baldorioty de castro , 10 seconds after we take the highway,

i look up to an over pass, and i see the ufo,
it was boomerang like, had red and white lights,not sure if other colors,

 it was as if was crossing the overpass north to south, as if was levitading over the bridge,in slow motion

it took me a while before my eyes could understand what i was seeing, so i slow down my car, cause there was hardly any traffic, 

it seem as if i was looking at it through a veil, or , mist.

was completely silent...I felt as if i was dreaming it and i was inside a sci-fi movie...

it took me a while to say anything to my friend, by the time i say it, and she look up, the ufo had faded behind a near large building, so she never saw it
content.summary: It was as big as a building

content.detailedDescription:
Hello,




    i recently witnessed what i believe to be a ufo, and there should be video evidence via a web cam.

on thursday july 9th i was at snowbird ski and summer resort east of salt lake city utah, when i witnessed a strange object hovering above twin peaks at about 2:50 p.M. the best way i can describe it is that it was in the shape of a block letter t hovering motionless above twin peaks, after witnessing it for about 20 seconds the object then changed shape and zoomed below the peak. i was on the tram at the dock on top of hidden peak when i saw it. the tram was full of people and i pointed out the object to my two nieces with me, but i am not sure if anyone else saw the object, but there is a web cam located on top of the tram station pointed directly at twin peaks which would have captured the whole incident. 

   i worked at snowbird as a public safety officer during my senior year at the university of utah, and i have been going to the ski resort most of my life to ski and for a time share my parents own, so i know the resort very well. there is nothing on that peak that could be confused as anything. additionally after graduating from college i joined the u.S. army and served as an airborne military police officer at ft. bragg where one of my main patrol areas was simmons army airfield, which houses every helicopter in the u.S. army. from my experience this was no helicopter.

   as i stated there is a web cam pointed directly at the peak which would have recorded everything (hidden peak cam). maybe you folks could get the feed from that time and check it out. again it was thursday july 9th 2015 at roughly 2:50 p.M. though i am not 100% on the time it was definitely between 2:30-4:00 p.M.




thank you

[name removed/cms/tg]
content.summary: T shaped object hovering over twin peaks snowbird utah. it then changed shape and descended below the mountain

content.detailedDescription: Laying in the grass. looking at stars, etc. few clouds not many. i look to the tree line to my left. towards an abandon warehouse/factory might be. above the trees and to the right i see an orb like, cloud moving at rapid speeds in opposite direction of other clouds that might have been around. i was frozen. my friend said panicked "do you see that?!". the ufo disappears in the middle of the sky (almost directly above the abandoned building). my other friend did not see it but got scared by our reactions. we were all shaken by the sighting.
content.summary: Cloud like orb. disappeared shortly after seeing.

content.detailedDescription: I was going to work when i look at the sky and saw this object, i took some pictures with my cellphone.
content.summary: Surprises me a lot. took some pictures

content.detailedDescription: Just wondering what the constant blinking lights that change color are. others have seen them.
content.summary: Constant star like blinking light that change color

content.detailedDescription: At the age of 12 or 13 my buddy and i were walking back home at dusk. we had been out and had to be home at dark. we grew up in farm country and were about a 100 yard from my house. he was about 200 yard from his house. we were walking past a woods that was about 30 acres square. all at once my buddy shouted "what the hell is that?" we observed a saucer shaped object that came right over the top, or slightly ahead, of us at tree height. no sound, bright orange and i saw windows. we just knew it had crashed in the woods. we ran all the way home. the next day we met to search the woods and found nothing. we walked all the way through the woods until it opened up to an open field. we thought we would find signs of or a crash site of whatever it was we saw the night before.
content.summary: At the age of 12-13 a friend and i were walking home in the dusk. my friend shouted "what is that?" i looked up and right over our heads and the trees came this disc shaped, glowing object. we ran home.

content.detailedDescription: I was watching the tv show "stargazing" by brian cox, when i was looking at the stars and then suddenly a fast object flew past at about 2/3 seconds and it caught my eye. so i rewinded the tape on sky and then i put it in slow mo and recorded it on my phone and i managed to stop the tape perfectly in line with the star and then the object appeared as a triangle. perfect in size with the star also.
content.summary: Fast triangular object flys past star whiles tv show "stargazing" is recording.

content.detailedDescription:
It was suppose to storm tonight.  i looked outside and it wasn't storming.  usually the sky is full of stars.  tonight i only saw two lights that looked like stars, but closer than usual.  they were moving around in different directions.  they seemed to flutter in one direction and then another.  i could see wings moving up and down.  at first i thought it was just stars.  then i wondered if they are drones.  i showed my granddaughter and she said we had to report it.  at 3:59 a.M. they are much higher and there appears to be three of them.  one is closer than the others and is moving more.  the other two are straight across from each other.  they are all moving and appear to have wings moving up and down.  they are definitely not birds or an airplane.  we came in the house and closed the door.  we have been checking on it. they are now higher in the sky. it is 4:19 a.M.

christmas 2014, my granddaughter and an elderly gentleman were coming to my house and they saw a ufo in the sky.  they said it was a circle with lights around it.
content.summary: It looked like two stars, but closer than usual and fluttering around.  solid object with flapping wings.
